description: A vulnerability has been found in PHPGurukul Taxi Stand Management System 1.0 and classified as problematic. Affected by this vulnerability is an unknown functionality of the file /admin/new-autoortaxi-entry-form.php. The manipulation of the argument registrationnumber/licensenumber leads to cross site scripting. The attack can be launched remotely. The exploit has been disclosed to the public and may be used.
